overview_metadata.overview_description: In this lesson, students calculate with scientific notation to solve problems with and without context. They apply the Product Rule of Powers and the Quotient Rule of Powers. Students subtract numbers in scientific notation to calculate the distance between planets and the sun.

overview_item_data_items: I can perform operations using scientific notation.
I can compare relative sizes of numbers written in scientific notation.
I can choose units of appropriate size for measurements of very large or very small quantities.
I can interpret scientific notation generated by technology.
You can operate on numbers in scientific notation.
You can apply the Product Rule of Powers and the Quotient Rule of Powers to numbers in scientific notation because all powers have the same base.
When multiplying or dividing numbers in scientific notation, you can multiply or divide the mantissas and apply the appropriate property of powers to the power.

To add or subtract numbers in scientific notation, rewrite the problem so that the characteristics are equal, add or subtract the mantissas, and keep the characteristic. Rewrite the result in scientific notation if needed.

overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_descriptio: Students use multiplication and estimation to determine a range of possible values based on given rates and time periods.

overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_title: Scientific Notation and the Properties of Powers
overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_descriptio: Students apply the Product Rule of Powers and Quotient Rule of Powers to scientific notation.

overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_title: Adding and Subtracting Numbers in Scientific Notation
overview_item_data_group_items.overview_item_data_group_item_descriptio: Students apply Properties of Powers to calculate the distance between planets and the sun.
Students identify the appropriate units to solve problems in context.

overview_item_data_items: If facilitating this lesson without student devices, no additional materials are needed.
To avoid printing additional materials not included in MATHbook (like Activate activities and Session Quick Checks) project them using the Present button above.
